Adam Whitcroft • Portfolio

Pricehare

I was commissioned to create the visual style for Pricehare, a web application which tracks the price of online goods, helping you buy them at the best price.

Working closely with the founder I created the logotype (based on Ubuntu Bold by Dalton Maag), icons and UI design of the product. Ubunut was selected for the logotype so it could easily be mirrored in the application itself.

All works dipicted ©Adam Whitcroft 2016 unless otherwise stated.
